name: Field books of the Third Asiatic Expedition
description: Description of documentary holdings related to the Central Asian Expedition.
snippet: Field journals documenting the expedition and maps used to guide the explorers have been collected and are available for view. It as well as other materials created or used during the expedition are available for public viewing. Choose something and make an appointment using this form http://www.amnh.org/our-research/research-library/access-and-policies/rare-book-collection/rare-book-collection-access-form
